## land-based source of pollution from agriculture and golf courses

[po_lbspaggolfrunoff](https://github.com/OHI-Science/mhi/blob/master/region2017/layers/)

The proxy for agricultural and landscaping runoff (nutrients from fertilizers; chemicals like pesticides and herbicides), calculated as the area of agricultural land and golf courses by watershed.

### Reference

[Ocean Tipping Points](http://www.pacioos.hawaii.edu/projects/oceantippingpoints/#data)
